Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MessageReviewHandler.description: Configuration information for optional review of messages.

FallbackResult.description: Specifies the fallback behavior if the handler does not return a valid response, encounters an error, or times out.
FallbackResult.markdownDescription:
Specifies the fallback behavior if the handler does not return a valid response, encounters an error, or times out.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ALLOW | DENY  
Update requires: No interruption

Uri.description: Identifier of the message review handler.
Uri.markdownDescription:
Identifier of the message review handler.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 170  
Pattern: ^$|^arn:aws:lambda:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]{12}:function:.+  
Update requires: No interruption

MessageReviewHandler.markdownDescription:
Configuration information for optional review of messages.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name of the room. The value does not need to be unique.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the room. The value does not need to be unique.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-_]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

LoggingConfigurationIdentifiers.description: Array of logging configuration identifiers attached to the room.
